headers.value: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' https://connect.facebook.net https://assets.calendly.com https://cdn.jsdelivr.net; frame-src https://www.youtube.com https://www.youtube-nocookie.com https://calendly.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://fonts.googleapis.com; font-src 'self' https://fonts.gstatic.com; img-src 'self' data: https://www.facebook.com https://connect.facebook.net; connect-src 'self' https://connect.facebook.net;
